page.title: 01GAZETTEER OF KILMARNOCK
page.content: THE AREA TAKES IN THE TOWN CENTRE WITH ITS SHOPPING AND COMMERCIAL INTERESTS,THREE MAIN SPORTING VENUES FOR; CRICKET,FOOTBALL AND RUGBY, MOST OF THE INDUSTRIAL MANUFACTURING SITES,RESIDENTIAL AREAS AND 30% OF THE AREA IS FARMLAND CONSISTING MAINLY OF MANAGED GRASSLAND.THERE IS AN 18 HOLE PUBLIC GOLF COURSE,3 SECONDARY SCHOOLS AND THE RAILWAY AND BUS STATIONS. THE TOWN CENTRE HAS A COVERED PRECINCT AND THE RADIAL ROADS ARE PEDESTRIAN ONLY MAKING SHOPPING VERY EASY AND SAFE.A MULTI-STOREY CAR PARK IS ADJACENT TO THE PRECINCT AS WELL AS STREET PARKING ELSEWHERE. THE BUS STATION SERVES ALL LOCAL AREAS AND MANY LONG DISTANCE VIA GLASGOW.THE MAJORITY OF TRAINS TRAVEL EITHER TO GLASGOW OR SOUTH ON THE LONDON LINE. SOME LOCAL ROUTES WERE REOPENED RECENTLY TO TROON AND AYR.
